hiveArticle.title: Fancy Grass in Kolkata - A horse made of Grass
hiveArticle.body:
Today my friend has shared this image with me. This image is from Kolkata, West Bengal, India. I have never seen this type of thing here in India, thus I can say my India is improving in looks. 

That's actually fancy because it has to be maintained well. And till now they have maintained it well. Oh I forgot to say I was born and brought up in Kolkata and it was very dirty previously. Since the last 3 years I have seen a lot of improvement in the beautification of the city. Great Work Management. Would love to see more of this initiative.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSEkqTKQrBgD3ujjkJojHm43ZtzVCEBrSrcotHuhiFJVz/image.png)

### Upvote, Follow, Resteem @codingdefined
